# AVAssetWriterInputCaptionAdaptor

**Class**

An object that appends captions to an asset writer input.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAssetWriterInputCaptionAdaptor
```

## Creating a caption adaptor

- **init(assetWriterInput:)**: Creates a new caption adaptor that writes to the specified asset writer input.

## Accessing the writer input

- **assetWriterInput**: The associated asset writer input.

## Appending captions

- **append(_:)**: Appends a caption to the writer input.
- **append(_:)**: Appends a caption group that the system writes to the output.

## Reading and writing

- **AVAssetReaderOutputCaptionAdaptor**: An object that reads caption group objects from an asset track that contains timed text.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
